import AWS from"aws-sdk";AWS.config.update({region:"us-east-1"});var s3=new AWS.S3({apiVersion:"2006-03-01"});export var uploadImage=function uploadImage(image,imageName,fn){var params={Bucket:"leoblogimages",Key:imageName,Body:image,ContentType:"image/jpeg"};// call S3 to retrieve upload file to specified bucket
s3.upload(params,function(err,data){if(err){console.log(err);return false;}if(data){console.log(data);fn();return true;}});};
